articles.title: ETtech Opinion | Are 10-minute deliveries a passing fad or the next big thing?

articles.author: ET Now
articles.title: Expect RBI to hike reverse repo by 15 bps this time, says CLSA’s Indranil Sengupta
articles.description: “We do expect the RBI to hike the reverse repo rate by 15 bps this time and by 100 bps over the entire fiscal and 50 bps next fiscal. So all in all, 150 bps of rate hikes based on more than 200 bps of hikes by the Fed as well as relatively high inflation.”
articles.content: We are forecasting GDP at 7.4%. RBI has put it at 7.8% so either they leave it there or may be bring it down a bit, says Indranil Sengupta, Economist & Head of Research, CLSA.On the top of everyo… [+3209 chars]
